tasks.title: Build Registration Page
tasks.description: Create a user-friendly registration page that captures name, email, password and displays proper error messages for validation.

tasks.title: Write API Documentation
tasks.description: Document all API endpoints clearly with request body, response format, authentication details, and include sample successful and failed responses too.

tasks.title: Prepare Sales Pitch Deck
tasks.description: Design a professional and clean pitch deck highlighting project goals, timeline, budget breakdown, and client testimonials in crisp bullet points.

tasks.title: Research Competitor Features
tasks.description: Analyze major competitors, document key features, user engagement strategies, marketing campaigns, and list improvement ideas for our platform.

tasks.title: Develop Notification System
tasks.description: Create real-time notification system with WebSocket fallback support, display messages inside app interface, and allow notification preferences configuration.

tasks.title: Optimize Landing Page
tasks.description: Improve page loading speed by compressing images, minimizing JavaScript bundles, lazy loading assets, and deferring non-essential scripts smartly.

tasks.title: Integrate Stripe Payments
tasks.description: Integrate Stripe API for one-time payments and subscriptions, handle webhooks correctly, ensure PCI compliance, and provide test environment sandbox.

tasks.title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Actions workflows to automatically build, test, lint, and deploy the app to staging and production environments without manual steps.

tasks.title: Finalize New Branding
tasks.description: Create consistent brand visuals including logos, typography, color palettes, and ensure usage guidelines are documented for design and marketing teams.

tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize GitHub repository, configure branch protections, write initial README, add contributors' guidelines, and link to project management board properly.

tasks.title: Create Basic Wireframes
tasks.description: Design initial wireframes for home page, dashboard, login page, and registration page, focusing mainly on core layout and navigation structure.

tasks.title: Launch Initial Landing Page
tasks.description: Deploy first version of public landing page with basic info about services, contact form, hero section, and responsive design support across devices.
